empty_cl: There is no Shopping Agent in this city
error_password_strong:
Password must contains
- Minimum 1 special character
- Combination with Alphabet and Number
- Minimum 1 character Uppercase
- Minimum 6 character
message_minimum_purchase: To make a transaction, the minimum total spend is IDR 100,000
error_new_transaction: Failed to create a new Transaction, because the product is no longer available
new_transaction_message: The new transaction will delete your current cart?
failed_scan_order_not_match_receipt_code: Failed Scan Order, Order Not Valid
agreement_payment_terms_text: Terms, Data Policy and Cookie Policy
forgot_success_code_email: Please Check Your Email in the Inbox / Spam Folder

already_sent_code: Code already sent, Please check your
notif_waiting_payment: has been made please complete the payment
notif_order_arrived: arrived at the Agent's place and ready to be taken
notif_modified: has experienced a change in quantity due to unavailability of goods
notif_pick_confirmed: has been confirmed by the Admin and will be sent soon
notif_expired: has expired, please do shopping again
notif_canceled_by_admin: canceled by the admin, due to unavailability of goods
notif_payment_decline: Payment Failed, Please try to order again
message_store_closed: Please make a Payment tomorrow, your Order will still in the Cart
expired_token: Your session is over, please do login again
app_need_update_message: A new version of SuperNinja is available. Please update to latest version
app_must_update_message: A new version of SuperNinja is available. Please update to latest version to continue using the App
error_qty_cart: The quantity must not be empty
status_mrspeedy_driver: Status: The courier is processing your order
guide_bca_va: Payment Instructions via BCA Virtual Account Transfer
atm_guide_1: Enter the card and PIN at the ATM then select Other Transactions, then select Transfer.
atm_guide_2: Select the Go to BCA Virtual Account option.
atm_guide_4: Check the total payment, then complete the payment.
ib_guide_1: Login to KlikBCA Individual then select Fund Transfer.
ib_guide_2: Select the Transfer to BCA Virtual Account option.
mb_guide_1: Login to the BCA Mobile application, select m-BCA then select m-Transfer.
mb_guide_2: Select the BCA Virtual Account option.
mb_guide_4: Check the total payment, then enter the PIN to complete the payment
message_exit_payment: You can proceed with the payment before the time expires on the order details page
message_success_payment: Payment has been successful, your order will be processed
excess_payment_message:
*The excess in payment is due to a change in the quantity or cancellation of the order as a whole due to unavailability of goods

Within a maximum of 5 working days, it will be adjusted in your credit card bill (if you pay using a credit card) or will be returned to your account if you use a debit card.
refund_warning: Make sure your data is correct, email is used for refund notification status
voucher_used_max: You already exceeded the limit of using this Voucher
refund_failed_maintenance: Sorry, System on maintenance. Please try in few hour later.
refund_failed_invalid_account: Sorry, your Bank Account is not valid. Please input valid bank account!
refund_failed_rejected: Sorry, your fund request has just rejected by Bank. Please input valid bank account!
refund_failed_bank_error: Sorry, something wrong on the bank system. Please try again later.

title_change_store_or_agent: Are you sure want changed the Shop or Agent?

desc_agent: If you choose Shopping Agent, your order will be sent to the Shopping Agent of your choice and you can pick it up at the Agent of your choice
